text: Patricia Marmont (born 9 August 1921) is an American actress. She is the daughter of Percy Marmont and was married to Nigel Green. She is known for her role as Andromache in the 1956 movie Helen of Troy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:People from New York (state)
title: Patricia Marmont
